name: Pointslocal
tag_list: media, newspapers, hyperlocal, maps, aggregator, news
overview:
Pointslocal is a privately held startup with a mission to use technology to extract meaningful insights and to interpret vast amounts of data from the Web in ways that are easily understood, actionable, informative and entertaining.

Pointslocal’s Geosocial Business Intelligence Platform and Hyperlocal Aggregation Platform are both extremely customizable to suit a very wide array of business cases and include both consumer-facing/media-oriented products and business-intelligence dashboards, APIs and tools.

Pointslocal is currently evaluating new partnerships as well as strategic and seed investment offers.

external_links.title: CE Pulse to Monitor and Rank Real-Time Online Sentiment About Consumer Electronics at the 2012 International CES
